title: elizaos Eliza (2025-03-15)
overview: Development focused on package improvements (changes to plugin-sql docs), new features (upgrade pckg manager), 6 bug fixes. with 8 contributors merging 14 PRs. Major work included various improvements.

features: use socketio, remove wss, use bun instead of node in the-org
fixes: agent last message animation + improbved profile card

issues_summary: implementing 1 feature requests including 'feat: upload .env file to webui configurator'
